description: A nice oasis set into the heart of Kentville.  A nice stell bridge over the cornwallis Riover delivers you unto a stacked loop trail.  the trail loops around some large wetlands and I spotted some turtles and a muskrat in the 20minutes I was on site.
directions: Highway 1 in Kentville.  turn on Klnodyke Rd and park where it ends by the cornwalllis River.  the trail starts there....
title: Ducks Unlimited Trail
